<blink>Hello world!</blink>

She blinked slowly back at him.

Then, backed away.

"Speed, not haster.", he said.

Her retort: "I implemented <blink> in Blink using Javascript!"

"Amazeballs. You should visit a doctor.", said he.

A PNG image exploded nearby, "Aw Snap!". What was that?

T'was the sound of a broken interval record.

But the data was inaccurate.
